name: Moonstone Pendant
description: A beautiful moonstone pendant with a silvery chain.
examine_text: The pendant features a moonstone at its center, surrounded by an intricate design inlaid in the silver. Despite its age, the lustrous sheen of the moonstone contrasts beautifully against the tarnished silver chain.

name: Old Scroll
description: An ancient scroll with unknown inscriptions.
examine_text: Unrolled, the scroll reveals rows of inscriptions that look extremely ancient. The characters are unfamiliar and are possibly of a language long forgotten. Despite being worn at the edges, the inscriptions have remained surprisingly well preserved.

name: Iron Casket
description: A tiny iron casket, it seems to be very old.
examine_text: Made entirely of iron, the small casket has an ornate design on its surface that's now partially obscured by rust. It has a sturdy lock, but the key is missing. You wonder what it might hold inside.

name: Ancient Sword
description: An ancient sword with a rusted iron blade and a hilt wrapped in worn leather.
examine_text: Despite the rust and wear, the sword retains a certain aura of dignity and power. The blade is still sharp, and the hilt, though worn, sits comfortably in your grip. An unknown emblem etched into the blade, perhaps a clue to its previous owner.

name: Leather Wallet
description: A worn out leather wallet, filled with a couple of notes and a driver's license.
examine_text: This creation is a perfect example of how classic items fade over time; with its dull brown colour and fraying at the edges, it definitely has seen better days. Despite its worn out look, you can find some cash and a driver's license inside.

name: Coconut shell
description: A coconut shell, half of it, has a high potential of being used as a drinking source.
examine_text: This is the half-shelled byproduct of a once fresh coconut. Its vibrant brown color and hardy exterior makes it look more welcoming. And with some water, it could be used as a drinking source.

name: Vintage Hat
description: An old wartime hat, that reflects the fashion of a bygone era.
examine_text: This hat brings back memories of the war era. With its large rim and deep brown color, it represents a time when men were gentlemen. Despite the obvious wear and tear, the hat's attractiveness is undiminished.

name: Ancient Tablet
description: An ancient stone tablet engraved with markings and symbols from an old civilization.
examine_text: The tablet is heavy and cool to the touch. It's covered in ancient symbols and scratches that reveal a bit about the civilization it comes from. It's worn with time, but the carvings are still clear enough to be studied.
